About

We build products for developers and designers.

Our Mission

Welcome to Golden Tiling, where we blend impeccable craftsmanship with visionary design. Allow us to introduce you to the driving force behind our success, the creative genius and dedicated leader, Alex Nora. With a lifelong passion for tiling and an unwavering commitment to excellence, Alex has not only transformed the tiling landscape on the Gold Coast but has also left an indelible mark on the industry.

Alex Nora's journey into the world of tiling began with an innate fascination for the intricate patterns and textures that tiles can create. This fascination soon evolved into a career dedicated to the art of tiling, and Alex's exceptional talent for turning ordinary spaces into extraordinary works of art became evident. With years of experience and a keen eye for detail, Alex has consistently pushed the boundaries of innovation in tiling, bringing fresh perspectives and creative solutions to every project undertaken.

At Golden Tiling, Alex Nora's vision is not just about aesthetics but also about functionality, durability, and exceeding clients' expectations. With a focus on customer satisfaction and a commitment to staying at the forefront of tiling trends and techniques, Alex ensures that every project, whether it's a bathroom transformation, a kitchen renovation, or outdoor tiling, is executed to perfection. Join us on this journey as we explore the world of tiling through the eyes of a true industry visionary, Alex Nora.

Our Values

01

Tiling Expertise

With years of experience, we have mastered the art of tiling. Our team employs industry-best practices, ensuring precision, durability, and visually stunning results in every project.

02

Quality Craftsmanship

We take immense pride in our craftsmanship. From material selection to installation, our meticulous approach ensures that your tiling project meets the highest standards of quality.

03

Customer Care and Honesty

At A N Golden Tiling, we prioritize customer care and honesty above all else. Our transparent communication and integrity-driven approach ensure that clients are always completely satisfied.

04

Tiling Innovation

We stay updated with the latest tiling trends and techniques. Our continuous pursuit of innovation allows us to offer cutting-edge solutions that elevate the aesthetics and functionality of any space.
